mapper.sql: dis.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID as dispatchOrderId, dis.dispatch_order_no as dispatchOrderNo, cinfo.code_content as productCodeContent, c.ACTIVE_TYPE as activeType, c.service_id as serviceId, c.SRV_ORD_IDS as srvOrdIds, c.cirCount as cirCount, c.ORDER_IDS as orderIds, c.RESOURCES as resources, c.ORDER_TYPE as orderType, c.SERIAL_NUMBERS as serialNumbers, vinfo.code_content as activeTypeName, cst.APPLY_ORD_NAME as orderTitle, dis.dispatch_title as dispatchTitle, c.cst_ord_id as cstOrdId, dis.staff_name as staffName, dis.staff_tel as staffTel, dis.send_date as sendDate, dis.dispatch_send_org as dispatchSendOrg, dis.staff_org as staffOrg, cst.cust_name_chinese as custNameChinese, cst.subscribe_id as subscribeId, gbci.code_content as dispatchSource, dis.dispatch_urgency as dispathUrgency

select
from gom_bdw_dispatch_order dis left join gom_bdw_code_info gbci on gbci.code_value = dis.dispatch_source and gbci.code_type = 'dispatch_source' inner join (select f.SYSTEM_RESOURCE,f.SERVICE_ID,f.CST_ORD_ID,f.ACTIVE_TYPE,f.RESOURCES,f.ORDER_TYPE,f.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID,count(*) as cirCount, WM_CONCAT(f.SRV_ORD_ID) as SRV_ORD_IDS,WM_CONCAT(f.ORDER_ID) as ORDER_IDS, WM_CONCAT(f.SERIAL_NUMBER) as SERIAL_NUMBERS from gom_bdw_srv_ord_info f inner join GOM_ORDER o on f.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID where 1=1
and f.trade_Id like '%'||#{tradeId}||'%'
and f.SERIAL_NUMBER like '%'||#{serialNumber}||'%'
group by f.SYSTEM_RESOURCE,f.SERVICE_ID,f.CST_ORD_ID,f.ACTIVE_TYPE,f.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID,f.RESOURCES,f.ORDER_TYPE) c on dis.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID = c.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID join gom_bdw_cst_ord cst on c.cst_ord_id = cst.cst_ord_id left join GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO_SECOND cinfo on c.service_id = cinfo.code_value and cinfo.code_type = 'product_code' left join GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO_SECOND vinfo on c.ACTIVE_TYPE = vinfo.code_value and vinfo.code_type = 'operate_type' join ( select ORG_ID from GOM_ORG_S START WITH oRG_ID =(SELECT ORG_ID FROM GOM_ORG_S a where a.PARENT_ORG_ID =1 START WITH a.ORG_ID=(select ORG_ID from gom_user_s where user_id=#{userId}) CONNECT BY prior a.PARENT_ORG_ID=a.ORG_ID ) CONNECT BY PARENT_ORG_ID=prior ORG_ID )b on cst.handle_dep_id=b.org_id where 1=1 and dis.state = '10A' and c.SYSTEM_RESOURCE='second-schedule-lt'
and cst.APPLY_ORD_NAME like '%'||#{orderTitle}||'%'
and cst.cust_name_chinese like '%'||#{custName}||'%'
and dis.dispatch_order_no like '%'||#{cirNum}||'%'
and cst.subscribe_id = #{subscribeId}
and c.ACTIVE_TYPE = #{actType}
and c.SERVICE_ID = #{productType}
